disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 25 April to end of Monday 25 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Sunny early on Monday but expected to cloud over.<br/><br/>Relatively 'clean' air arriving on a path from Scandinavia via the North Sea. A north-easterly breeze should also aid dispersion of any local emissions.<br/>     <br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday. GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday.
